name: C9 Development
description:
We are a creative studio specialized in graphic design, web development, digital marketing, audio and video production, located in Tijuana Mexico. With more than 8 years of experience, we direct our efforts in covering creative needs always being at the forefront of market trends, always starting from a functional and aesthetic analysis.
For C9 studio all our clients are unique and special, that is why we dedicate the necessary time so that each of the stages in which we divide the project result in success and the final result is the best.
